descricao: The proposal of this project was to reproduce a AirBnB page as simmilar as we(me and my team) could. It is visible that the differences are few, and it looks like a real page.

This project was created due to a partnership between FIAP and Tech Mahindra. The proposal was to creat a plataform responsible to popularize the Formula E Sport, and competitions. Also one of the requests was to create-it with a gamiphying structure.
